description: This table contains the implants information for the surgical/invasive procedure log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: IMP_NO_INV_ITEM_YN
columns.description:
Specifies if this implant has no inventory item specified.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action taken on the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Implanted


Explanted


Wasted


Adjusted

columns.name: IMPLANT_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The implant area category ID for the implant associated with the procedural log.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMPLANT_LATERAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The laterality of the area.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default

columns.name: IMPLANT_RSN_WSTD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason why the implant was wasted.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMPLANT_CREATED_YN
columns.description:
Was the implant created in the log?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IMP_NO_INV_ITEM_YN

columns.name: IMP_TRAY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the instrument type of the implant tray.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMP_TRAY_ID
columns.description: This item is populated if the current implant row is an implant tray, and stores the tray id.

columns.name: IMPLANT_FLASH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this implant has been flash-sterilized.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IMP_NO_INV_ITEM_YN

columns.name: FLSH_AUTCLVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The autoclave category number that was used to sterilize this implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: FLSH_LOAD
columns.description: The load batch ID that this implant was flash sterilized in.

columns.name: FLSH_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the reason that this implant was flash sterilized.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: FLSH_VER_BY_ID
columns.description: The unique id of the staff member who was responsible for verifying that this implant was properly flash sterilized.

columns.name: FLSH_RSLT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the result of this implants flash sterilization process.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: FLSH_PRE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the reason this implant was pre-released in the flash sterilization process.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
